member.name: P:ProductivityTools.TrainingLog.Contract.Training.Application
member.summary: Application which is the source of data, it could be Endomondo, Sports-Tracker, or anything we want

member.name: P:ProductivityTools.TrainingLog.Contract.Training.Account
member.summary: Id of group of trainings, if you have two accounts, like yours and your partner you could add here id

member.name: P:ProductivityTools.TrainingLog.Contract.Training.Name
member.summary: Free text to describe sport, for example you could add some meaningfull information like Olympics 2020

member.name: P:ProductivityTools.TrainingLog.Contract.Training.Comment
member.summary: Additional field to describe sport, for example you could add person with who you had been training

member.name: P:ProductivityTools.TrainingLog.Contract.Training.Source
member.summary: Every application like Endomondo has source of training and maily it is Manual or GPX

member.name: P:ProductivityTools.TrainingLog.Contract.Training.ExternalIdList
member.summary: Every training can have multiple external Ids, for example, we registered training in Endomondo, than we improtet it to Training Log and than exported to Sports-Tracker, than in external Id we will have two ids: Endomodno and Sports-Tracker
